name: The Feedback Organizer
description: Feedback is the key to learning, improving and getting better personally and professionally. This Notion guide and template helps you to get all your feedback in one place, track it, reflect on it and actually grow. features: Tips and templates forself reflectionvia a weekly review.; Guide and template for your1on1's, including tips on how to get feedback from your manager.; Template and tipspeer feedback.; Template and tips forperformance reviews.; Guide and template togive quality feedback.; Template and tips on your role, responsibilities andexpectation setting.; Guide and template ongoals.; Knowledge basewith good reads.; BONUS:peer review templatein Google Forms; This is a Notion Template.
